items.headline: Anthony Edwards Named All-Star Game MVP as New Format Shines!
items.summary: The Minnesota Timberwolves' Anthony Edwards led the USA Stars to victory in the revamped NBA All-Star Game, earning MVP honors after a thrilling night of competitive mini-games at the Intuit Dome.

items.headline: Kawhi Leonard Trade Rumors Circulate Post-Deadline
items.summary: Despite remaining with the Clippers, reports indicate that other teams were 'investigating' the possibility of a Kawhi Leonard trade around the 2026 NBA trade deadline, following the Clippers' moves of James Harden and Ivica Zubac.

items.headline: Deni Avdija Makes All-Star Debut for Team World
items.summary: Portland Trail Blazers forward Deni Avdija made his first NBA All-Star appearance, representing Team World in the new tournament format.

items.headline: USA Stars Edge Team World in OT Thriller
items.summary: Scottie Barnes hit a game-winning three-pointer in overtime to secure a narrow victory for the USA Stars over Team World in the opening mini-game of the All-Star tournament.

items.headline: Fox Buzzer-Beater Lifts USA Stripes
items.summary: De'Aaron Fox drained a clutch three-pointer at the buzzer to give the USA Stripes a dramatic 42-40 win against the USA Stars.

items.headline: Leonard's 31 Points Power Stripes Past World
items.summary: Kawhi Leonard erupted for 31 points in just 12 minutes, including a game-winning three-pointer, as the USA Stripes defeated Team World 48-45, eliminating Team World from contention.

items.headline: USA Stars Dominate Stripes for All-Star Championship
items.summary: The USA Stars, led by Anthony Edwards, cruised to a dominant 47-21 victory over the USA Stripes in the championship game of the new All-Star tournament format.

items.headline: Anthony Edwards: All-Star MVP
items.summary: The Minnesota Timberwolves star was crowned MVP of the 2026 NBA All-Star Game, leading the USA Stars to the championship and showcasing clutch play throughout the tournament.

items.headline: Kawhi Leonard's Scoring Explosion
items.summary: The Clippers forward put on a show for his home crowd, scoring an incredible 31 points in just 12 minutes during the USA Stripes' victory over Team World.

items.headline: Victor Wembanyama's Competitive Spirit
items.summary: The San Antonio Spurs phenom showcased his competitive fire, scoring 19 points in one game against the USA Stripes and a total of 33 points across Team World's two games.

items.headline: Deni Avdija's All-Star Debut
items.summary: In his first All-Star appearance, the Portland Trail Blazers forward contributed 5 points, including a three-pointer, in 8 minutes played for Team World against the USA Stars. He is currently averaging 25.2 points, 7.2 rebounds, and 6.6 assists in the regular season.

items.headline: Luka Doncic Returns from Injury
items.summary: Despite a hamstring strain that sidelined him for four games, the Lakers star played limited minutes in the All-Star Game, providing a positive update on his recovery.

items.headline: LeBron James' 22nd All-Star Appearance
items.summary: In his record 23rd NBA season, LeBron James made his 22nd All-Star Game appearance, scoring 5-8 points in mini-games, while remaining uncertain about his playing future beyond this season.

items.headline: Giannis Antetokounmpo Reaffirms Commitment to Bucks
items.summary: Milwaukee Bucks superstar Giannis Antetokounmpo has stated his commitment to the team 'as of today' (February 15), despite ongoing speculation about his future.

items.headline: Luka Doncic Hamstring Injury Update Positive
items.summary: Lakers star Luka Doncic provided a positive update on his hamstring injury after playing limited minutes in the All-Star Game, indicating he feels good despite missing recent regular-season games.

items.headline: Record-Breaking NBA Trade Deadline Activity
items.summary: The 2026 NBA trade deadline saw a record 28 separate deals completed and 73 players changing teams, making it one of the busiest deadlines in league history with stars like Anthony Davis and James Harden on the move earlier in the month.
